definition: to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: My mother is one of the Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 我母亲是卫理公会派教徒之一。

sentences.english: CKCMC is located in the State of Perak Manjung County.
sentences.chinese: 莫珍歪卫理公会是位于在霹雳州的曼隆县。

sentences.english: Could you actually marry a Methodist?
sentences.chinese: 你能和卫理公会教徒结婚吗？

sentences.english: The pregnancy progresses normally for Karen, an active member of the Panther Creek United Methodist Church in Morristown, Tennessee.
sentences.chinese: 凯伦住在田纳西州莫里斯镇，是卫理公会的虔诚信徒。

sentences.english: As a methodist he was a fervent advocate of temperance .
sentences.chinese: 身为一名卫理公会教徒，他是禁欲的热情拥护者。

sentences.english: She jest seems to have been born with a sort of chronic spite agin men and Methodists.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎天生就憎恨男人和卫理公会教徒。

sentences.english: The Wei Li Gong Hui methodist church in Jinfeng town, Fujian province, China. Photograph: Dan Chung for the Guardian
sentences.chinese: 中国福建金峰镇，卫理公会教堂。

sentences.english: Other students on the SMU campus also had high hopes for the future.
sentences.chinese: 南卫理公会大学的其他学生也对未来抱有很高的期望。

sentences.english: I can still hear the sounds of those Methodist bells.
sentences.chinese: 卫理公会圣钟之声我还能听见。

sentences.english: The main nonconformist groups in England are Methodist, Congregational and Baptist.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰主要的新教群体有卫理公会，公理会和浸信会。

pinyin: Huo4 pu3 jin1 si1 Da4 xue2

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
related.word: 耶稣基督后期圣徒教会

pinyin: Jia1 li4 fu2 ni2 ya4 Da4 xue2
